trans-unit.source: Represents information about a character hit within a glyph run.
trans-unit.target: 表示命中标志符号运行中的字符有关的信息。

trans-unit.source: The CharacterHit structure provides information about the index of the first character that got hit as well as information about leading or trailing edge.
trans-unit.target: CharacterHit 结构可提供有关索引的第一个字符获取命中的信息，以及有关前导或尾随边缘的信息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit"></xref>结构。

trans-unit.source: Index of the first character that got hit.
trans-unit.target: 被命中第一个字符的索引。

trans-unit.source: In the case of a leading edge, this value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 对于前导边缘，此值是 0。

trans-unit.source: In the case of a trailing edge, this value is the number of code points until the next valid caret position.
trans-unit.target: 对于尾随边缘，此值是直到下一步的有效脱字号位置的代码点的数量。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified object is equal to the current <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的对象是否等于当前<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The object to compare with the current <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 要与当前比较的对象<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: if obj is equal to the current object; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果 obj 等同于当前对象; 否则为 。

trans-unit.source: If obj is not a object, is returned.
trans-unit.target: If obj is not a object, is returned.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref> is equal to the current <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref>等同于当前<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref> to compare with the current <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"> </xref>要与当前比较<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: if obj is equal to the current object; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果 obj 等同于当前对象; 否则为 。

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the first character that got hit.
trans-unit.target: 获取被命中的第一个字符的索引。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> value that represents the index.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Int32>表示的索引的值。</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Serves as a hash function for <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 用作哈希函数<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: It is suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures such as a hash table.
trans-unit.target: 它是适合在哈希算法和数据结构，如哈希表中使用。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> value that represents the hash code for the current object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Int32>值，该值表示当前对象的哈希代码。</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Compare two <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref> strings for equality.
trans-unit.target: 比较两个<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref>字符串是否相等。

trans-unit.source: The first instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref> to compare.
trans-unit.target: 第一个实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref>进行比较。

trans-unit.source: The second instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref> to compare.
trans-unit.target: 第二个实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref>进行比较。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> when the values of <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit.FirstCharacterIndex*> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit.TrailingLength*> properties are equal for both objects; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>时的值<> *1> 和<> *1> 属性是对于两个对象相等; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Compare two <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref> strings for inequality.
trans-unit.target: 比较两个<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref>是否不相等的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The first instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref> to compare.
trans-unit.target: 第一个实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref>进行比较。

trans-unit.source: The second instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref> to compare.
trans-unit.target: 第二个实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference"></xref>进行比较。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> when the values of <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit.FirstCharacterIndex*> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit.TrailingLength*> properties are equal for both objects; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>时的值<> *1> 和<> *1> 属性是对于两个对象相等; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the trailing length value for the character that got hit.
trans-unit.target: 获取被命中的字符的尾随的长度值。

trans-unit.source: In the case of a leading edge, this value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 对于前导边缘，此值是 0。

trans-unit.source: In the case of a trailing edge, this value is the number of code points until the next valid caret position.
trans-unit.target: 对于尾随边缘，此值是直到下一步的有效脱字号位置的代码点的数量。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> value that represents the trailing length.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Int32>值，该值表示尾随的长度。</xref:System.Int32>
